revised_title: The Influence of Hexose Products on Enzyme Activity in Sucroclastic Enzymes
tldr: The author investigates the effect of the products of change on the rate of change in sucroclastic enzymes. They found that the configuration of the hexose and the enzyme has a close relationship, and the enzyme and hexose likely combine together in some intimate manner. This research helps to understand the specific action of enzymes on hexoses and their products.
